      • getResourceProviderConfigurationValidator

        protected ConfigurationValidator getResourceProviderConfigurationValidator(ResourceProviderMetadata resourceProviderMetadata)
        Returns the resource provider configuration validator for the specified resource provider ID. The validator should make a best-faith effort to identify configuration problems that will prevent successful resource provider creation.
        Returns:
        the configuration validator
